__TOC__
This is a list of contributors who are currently working on [[Translating WordPress |WordPress localization]] including [[WordPress in Your Language |translating WordPress]], the WordPress web site, forums, and other resources that meet the goals of their community. If you have SVN access or contribute to an established WordPress website or forums please add your information below.

There is another page for [[L10n:Teams_Currently_Forming |teams currently forming]].

== Basque - Euskara ==

* We work on the last basque translation collaboratively at our [http://pootle.librezale.org/projects/wordpress/ Pootle].
* When a new version is released we update [http://svn.automattic.com/wordpress-i18n/eu/ SVN].
* Need help? Visit the [http://librezale.org/foroa/viewforum.php?id=44 Basque WordPress community forum]
* [http://eu.wordpress.org eu.wordpress.org] is just the place where you will find the last basque localized WordPress ready to download.

== Malayalam മലയാളം ==

Hi every body, As you know lot of Malayalees using WordPress as blogging platform and CMS site for personal and commercial use, Most of theme are beginners and unfamiliar with coding and facing problems with language, plugins, themes and customizations.


As Malayalees, let us join to help them,let us start to translate WordPress to Malayalam,It come 7402 strings to be translated. Wordpress Malayalam translation will change entire think and feel of Malayalees on web, it will help keralites to easily create and use websites. - Salman Kerala

Count Down to release WordPress Malayalam : 24 Days

Most of the kerala peoples likes see WordPress in Malayalam. Come lets join as a part of the big translation. Our aim is CMS back end for malayalees. We welcome all supports and suggestions. [http://dazetech.co.in/ Dazetech Solutions] 


We are one of the leading CMS Website development company from Kerala, we are happy to be a part of Malayalam Version of WordPress. For any query or suggestions please feel free to contact us contact [at] dazetech.co.in
